alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 1:34PM MST until March 24 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by earlier upstream rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is occurring along the Hassayampa River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 130 PM MST, gauges and the county highway department report flooding has closed roads in the area. - This replaces the previous warning along the river. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hassayampa River at Patton Road, Tonopah-Salome Highway, and Baseline Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
